emeScheme.names: Experiment, Species, Treatment, Measurement, DataExtraction, DataFile

ExperimentList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, ml, NA, g/l, NA, NA, NA
ExperimentList.type: character, character, character, character, character, character, numeric, character, numeric, character, character, character
ExperimentList.allowedValues: NA, treatment, ..., treatment, ..., treatment, ..., none, bench, ..., NA, NA, NA, NA, axenic, dirty, clean, …, treatment, single trophic level, multiple trophic level, …, NA
ExperimentList.names: name, temperature, light, humidity, incubator, container, microcosmVolume, mediaType, mediaConcentration, cultureConditions, comunityType, comment
ExperimentList.class: emeSchemeData_Experiment, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

SpeciesList.unit: NA, NA, NA, cells / ml, NA, NA
SpeciesList.type: character, character, character, numeric, character, character
SpeciesList.allowedValues: NA, NA, NA, treatment, value, bacteria, bacteriavore, predator, phototroph, …, NA
SpeciesList.names: name, strain, source, density, functionalGroup, comment
SpeciesList.class: emeSchemeData_Species, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

TreatmentList.allowedValues: NA, temp, light, initial density, comunity composition, densities, dispersal, viscosity, disturbance, communityType, species, …}, C, lux, name, ..., value, variable: freetext, ..., NA
TreatmentList.class: emeSchemeData_Treatment, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

MeasurementList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, days, NA, days between sampling, ml, NA
MeasurementList.type: character, character, character, character, character, integer, integer, numeric, numeric, character
MeasurementList.allowedValues: NA, O2 concentration, video, manual count, …, presens Optode, microscopy, …, %, mmol, count, …, species, OUT, gene, community, particles, …, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA
MeasurementList.names: name, variable, method, unit, object, lengthOfTimeSeries, noOfSamplesInTimeSeries, samplingAverageFrequency, samplingVolume, comment
MeasurementList.class: emeSchemeData_Measurement, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

DataExtractionList.allowedValues: NA, bemovi x.y.z, ..., NA, NA, NA
DataExtractionList.class: emeSchemeData_DataExtraction, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

DataFileList.allowedValues: NA, Name of the treatment. Each name specifies one treatment and can (should) occur multiple times., coldlight, hot, highdens, Name of the Measurement process. This includes methodology, variables, ... . Each name specifies one Measurement process and can occur multiple times., video_lf, o2_hf, mc, os_lf, video_hf, Name of the DataExtraction process. This includes methodology, variables, ... . Each name specifies one Measurement process and can occur multiple times in the case of multiple parameters in the analysis., bemovi_1, bemovi_2, raw, NA
DataFileList.class: emeSchemeData_DataFile, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame
